text: Calatola columbiana is a species of flowering plant in the family Metteniusaceae. It was formerly placed in the family Icacinaceae. It is endemic to Colombia. ==References== * Calderon, E. 1998. Calatola columbiana. 2006 IUCN Red List of Threatened Species. Downloaded on 20 August 2007. Category:Metteniusaceae Category:Endemic flora of Colombia Category:Endangered plants Category:Taxonomy articles created by Polbot
title: Calatola columbiana
